name: Impossible Platformer (lzimm)
description: YOU NEED TO GO FULLSCREEN. Space to Jump, Arrow Keys, or WASD to move,  'r' to restart. This game is a simple, yet difficult platformer made using Unity. Only 10 levels but may take a long time to beat(30min-1hour, maybe less if you are great at games like this), some people may even believe it to be impossible-trust me, it's not impossible. Every level has been thoroughly tested and they are all beatable... just a little difficult. Screenshot the game end screen and post it in the comments to brag that you can beat it.
